title: HoleSection
description: A section of a wellbore drilled with a constant bit and/or under-reamer diameter

WellActivityID.title: Well Activity ID
WellActivityID.description: Identifier of the Well Activity in which the hole section was drilled

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Human recognizable context/name of the hole section.

VerticalMeasurement.title: Vertical Measurement Reference
VerticalMeasurement.description: References an entry in the VerticalMeasurements array for the Wellbore identified by WellboreID, or a standalone vertical reference which defines the vertical reference datum for all measured depths of the HoleSection record. If this is not populated, the VerticalMeasurement is derived from the Wellbore.

Size.title: Size
Size.description: The nominal diameter of the hole section.

MeasuredDepthTop.title: Measured Depth Start
MeasuredDepthTop.description: The Measured depth at the top of the hole section. For actual wellbores use data.VerticalMeasurement as wellbore ZDP. For planned wellbores, navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in data.VerticalMeasurement.

MeasuredDepthBase.title: Measured Depth End
MeasuredDepthBase.description: The Measured depth at the base of the hole section. For actual wellbores use data.VerticalMeasurement as wellbore ZDP. For planned wellbores, navigate via WellboreID to the side-car WellPlanningWellbore, which holds the depth reference in. data.VerticalMeasurement.

StartDateTime.title: Start Date/time
StartDateTime.description: Date/time when drilling commenced on the hole section.

EndDateTime.title: End Date/time
EndDateTime.description: Date/time when drilling completed on the hole section.

IsPilotHole.title: Is Pilot Hole
IsPilotHole.description: Flag if Hole Section was drilled as a pilot hole

PlannedMeasuredDepthBase.title: Planned Measured Depth Base
PlannedMeasuredDepthBase.description: Planned Base measured depth of the Hole Section. Only used for Actual Hole Sections to enable a comparison against plan.

PlannedTrueVerticalDepthBase.title: Planned True Vertical Depth Base
PlannedTrueVerticalDepthBase.description: Planned Base true vertical depth of the Hole Section. Only used for Actual Hole Sections to enable a comparison against plan.

DrillingActivityCode.title: Drilling Activity Code
DrillingActivityCode.description: Activity Code relevant for drilling the hole section.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: A comment or description associated with the hole section
Comment.example: 8-1/2" hole section drilled 400' deeper than plan.
